title: Sichuan chicken
ingredients: ['4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', '3 tablespoons cornflour', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '5 tablespoons light soy sauce', '1 1/2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '4 tablespoons water', '1 teaspoon sugar', '3 spring onions, sliced diagonally into 1cm pieces', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste']
